block.p: After two Jewish cemeteries were desecrated in the western German state of Rhineland-Palatinate and an explosive device was found outside a Jewish family's home in Bavaria, German politicians reviewed a possible ban on the small rightist National Democratic Party on the ground that it is a threat to democratic stability. The Constitutional Court, however, has not upheld any such ban since the 1950's. The government and Jewish leaders said an advertising campaign for tolerance, called Show Your Face and featuring sports and entertainment celebrities, would start in the fall.
